text: Dwijendra Narayan Jha (died 4 February 2021) was an Indian historian of ancient and medieval India. He was a professor of history at Delhi University. He was a member of the Indian Council of Historical Research. He was a known critic of against Hindu nationalist ideology. Jha died on 4 February 2021, at age 81. ==References== Category:2021 deaths Category:Indian historians
title: D. N. Jha
